name: admin.conversations.bulkArchive
desc: Archive public or private channels in bulk.

channel_ids.desc: An array of channel IDs to archive. No more than 100 items are allowed.

errors.action_already_in_progress: Another bulk action request is currently in progress
errors.internal_error: Something unexpected happened, try again in a little bit. Sorry for that!
errors.team_not_found: Team ID provided does not exist
errors.restricted_action: User does not have permission to perform this action
